long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
gun mayhem 2 game is available in the chrome web store just it install it and just play gun mayhem 2 game.


Player 1 Controls
Arrow keys = move
Z = primary weapon
X = secondary weapon


Player 2 Controls
WASD = move
T = primary wapon
Y = secondary weapon


Player 3 Controls
Num pad /789 = move
Num pad * = primary weapon
Num pad - = secondary weapon


Player 4 Controls
Num pad 5123 = move
Num pad 0 = primary weapon
Num pad . = secondary weapon

thank you-:)
